item.description: This is a self guided tour that includes several inns, bed and breakfasts, shops, etc. in several towns in the Monadnock area of NH. At each stop there will be cookies and/or other refreshments and recipes. The cost is $8 per person(cash or check only) and you will need to bring a container for cookies to take home. We probably won't get to all of the stops by 4pm. We had a great time doing this last year but it won't be the same without an ice storm!! For a list of all the stops and more information go to currierandivescookietour.com. We can meet at exit 4 in Londonderry and in Nashua. We will need drivers.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Currier and Ives Cookie Tour
